text: Robert James Douglas (born 24 April 1972) is a Scottish former professional footballer and current coach for Arbroath who played as a goalkeeper. ==Honours== Livingston *Scottish Football League Third Division: 1995–96 Dundee *Scottish Football League First Division: 1997–98 *Scottish Challenge Cup: 2009–10 Celtic *Scottish Premier League: 2000–01, 2001–02, 2003–04 *Scottish Cup: 2000–01, 2003–04, 2004–05 *UEFA Cup runner-up: 2002–03 ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:British association football goalkeepers Category:Footballers from South Lanarkshire Category:Leicester City F.C. players Category:Plymouth Argyle F.C. players
title: Robert Douglas (footballer)
